Acupuncture recruits the body's own healing powers to reduce or eliminate a disease...and we just happen to have the perfect veterinarian for the job.](https://www.losgatosvet.com/files/2014/03/mauriceacu.jpg) Dr. Haleh Siahpolo is a Certified Veterinary Acupuncturist, Chinese Herbalist and Food Therapist. Haleh became interested in holistic medicine while in vet school, when acupuncture helped with her own knee injury. She enjoys integrating Eastern and Western medicine to provide the best possible treatment options for companion animals. Haleh trained with a third generation traditional Chinese medicine practitioner to learn acupuncture, herbal and food therapy for animals.
